content.rendered:
Disposable Syringe Series

  • Types: Two-parts or three-parts, Luer slip or luer lock
  • Specification:1ml,3ml, 5ml, 10ml, 20ml, 30ml, 50ml, 60ml, 100ml
  • Needle size: 16G to 30G
  • Sanitary standard and quality in accordance with the CE, FDA, ISO13485 standards
  • Packing: PE package, paper-plastic package, Laminated film with dialyzing paper package, Blister package
  • OEM can be arranged

The Disposable syringe is specially designed for human subcutaneous, flesh, muscle, vein and other injections. Its main materials, structure and performance are as follows:

1. Materials and structures

The product consists of a jacket (polypropylene), a core rod (polypropylene), a rubber piston (natural rubber), and an injection needle.

2. Main technical parameters and requirements

(1) Body tightness 300kpa and 3.0N force core rod 30S does not leak, 60±5S under 88kpa negative pressure does not leak, piston core rod does not separate;

(2) Good sliding performance.

Disposable syringe treatment method

Disposable syringes are medical wastes and cannot be disposed of as freely as normal garbage. They are placed in trash cans for recycling. Such medical wastes are generally disposed of in a centralized and harmless manner, including incineration, destructive disinfection, and deep burial after incineration. When using a safety box for incineration, the temperature should be above 800 °C to reduce air pollution; if there is no safety box, a lower incinerator with a temperature (300 ° C ~ 400 ° C) can also be used. In areas where there are no destroyers and incinerators, the method of deep burying after incineration can be used.

Here, we must remind everyone that disposable syringes should not be recycled at will. Some disposable medicines will have some residual medicines that are not cleaned, so be sure to pay attention to them. You can’t ignore them. not allowed.
